author: lukaszrozmej
content: <@360491619402776577> what is the status of implementation and planned rollout of eth/69? https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8271

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I have a draft implementation for it in geth. I was waiting for some other clients to signal their approval, before unilaterly merging it. If you're up for it, we can go ahead

author: lukaszrozmej
content: we have a good, but yet not properly tested implementation: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/pull/7052
